attributes.additional_details: I enquired in numerous areas in Leicester for a single placement for infant school to be told they're all full. What chance do our children stand if they cannot even gain entry to the start of their education? This is our future generation; if this is not addressed immediately, what hope do we have as a society? Every child is entitled to an education and is required by law to attend school . This needs to be addressed ASAP, my grandson and others like him are being educationally stunted through no fault of their own…
